function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for increased density in urban areas due to the need for affordable housing. This could lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission due to crowded living conditions.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation guidelines, increase access to healthcare services, and promote air circulation and ventilation in high-density housing.","Technologies":"Smart air filtration systems, touchless fixtures, and IoT-based monitoring for sanitation and air quality.","People":"Residents of high-density housing, especially those in urban areas.","Owner":"Government agencies, housing developers, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure.","Impact":"Changes in population density and potential disease exposure due to conversion of office spaces to residential units.","Mitigation":"Conduct impact assessments before conversion, implement zoning and building regulations, and ensure adequate infrastructure and services for the increased residential population.","Technologies":"GIS mapping for impact assessments, smart city technology for infrastructure management, and urban planning software.","People":"Residents of city centers and those affected by changes in population density.","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, and property developers."}]}
